column2: the Art Institute is a wonderful museum to visit
column3: simply for the experience itself. It has a world-class collection of Impressionist paintings
column4: and decent collections of other pieces. The curators are top-notch
column5: and it shows in their designs. The special exhibitions are somewhat degraded by their commercial orientation. Accessibility to the public has been reduced in recent years
column6: also due to financial interests. The Art Institute is outstanding. I recommend a visit.
